Thanks for seeding this wonderful movie. But does anyone know where I might be able to get English subtitles (.sub or .srt files)? Thanks.

You can find the English subtitles here:
http://subtitles.images.o2.cz/d/145919/City+of+Lost+Children%2C+The.html

If this direct link does not work, try the starting page of the website 
http://subtitles.images.o2.cz 
and find the movie in the alphabetical index.

They worked perfectly for me.

For those wondering, here is a great guide for embedding subtitles into a video file. Useful if plan on playing this movie on an xbox360 or ps3 or some other device.

http://www.divxland.org/permanentsubtitling.php

P.S. - Yes, nimrod, replace the [DOT] with a dot/period/.
